metadata.name: Double Jumpers: The Dark Backwards
metadata.description: When Jason and his team of programmers accidentally swapped bodies with their videogame creations, they unwittingly let evil loose upon the world. Pilfer the Betrayer now walks among us, trapped in the body of sad sack intern Tom Bucklebee, and woe to anyone who crosses his path! The Dark Backwards seamlessly ties in to the original cult-classic mini and sets the stage for the next chapter in the Double Jumpers universe!
